comment:
* CDMA Service Category Program Data from SCPT (Service Category Programming Teleservice) SMS, * as defined in 3GPP2 C.S0015-B section 4.5.19. *

* The CellBroadcastReceiver app receives an Intent with action * {@link android.provider.Telephony.Sms.Intents#SMS_SERVICE_CATEGORY_PROGRAM_DATA_RECEIVED_ACTION} * containing an array of these objects to update its list of cell broadcast service categories * to display. * * {@hide}

variables.name: OPERATION_DELETE_CATEGORY
variables.comment: Delete the specified service category from the list of enabled categories.

variables.name: OPERATION_ADD_CATEGORY
variables.comment: Add the specified service category to the list of enabled categories.

variables.name: OPERATION_CLEAR_CATEGORIES
variables.comment: Clear all service categories from the list of enabled categories.

variables.name: CATEGORY_CMAS_EXTREME_THREAT
variables.comment: Indicates an extreme threat to life and property

variables.name: CATEGORY_CMAS_SEVERE_THREAT
variables.comment: Indicates an severe threat to life and property

variables.name: CATEGORY_CMAS_CHILD_ABDUCTION_EMERGENCY
variables.comment: Indicates an AMBER child abduction emergency

variables.name: CATEGORY_CMAS_LAST_RESERVED_VALUE
variables.comment:
The last reserved value of a CMAS service category according to 3GPP C.R1001 table
     * 9.3.3-1.

variables.name: mLanguage
variables.comment: Language used for service category name (defined in BearerData.LANGUAGE_*).

variables.name: mMaxMessages
variables.comment: Maximum number of messages to store for this service category.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Flatten this object into a Parcel.
     *
     * @param dest  The Parcel in which the object should be written.
     * @param flags Additional flags about how the object should be written (ignored).

methods.name: public int getOperation()
methods.comment:
* Returns the service category operation, e.g. {@link #OPERATION_ADD_CATEGORY}.
     *
     * @return the service category operation

methods.name: public int getCategory()
methods.comment:
* Returns the CDMA service category to modify. See 3GPP2 C.S0015-B section 3.4.3.2 for more
     * information on the service category. Currently only CMAS service categories 0x1000 through
     * 0x10FF are supported.
     *
     * @return a 16-bit CDMA service category value

methods.name: public int getLanguage()
methods.comment:
* Returns the CDMA language code for this service category.
     * @return one of the language values defined in BearerData.LANGUAGE_*
     * @hide

methods.name: public int getMaxMessages()
methods.comment:
* Returns the maximum number of messages to store for this service category.
     * @return the maximum number of messages to store for this service category
     * @hide

methods.name: public int getAlertOption()
methods.comment:
* Returns the service category alert option, e.g. {@link #ALERT_OPTION_DEFAULT_ALERT}.
     * @return one of the {@code ALERT_OPTION_*} values
     * @hide

methods.name: public String getCategoryName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the service category name, in the language specified by {@link #getLanguage()}.
     * @return an optional service category name
     * @hide

methods.name: public int describeContents()
methods.comment:
* Describe the kinds of special objects contained in the marshalled representation.
     * @return a bitmask indicating this Parcelable contains no special objects

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
